languages.text: "Так что решайте, на чьей вы стороне — предателя и убийцы или законной наследницы Дома". {n}Последние слова Теобальд произносит чуть мягче, с благоговением глядя на спящую девушку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Так что решайте, на чьей вы стороне. Предателя и убийцы или законной наследницы Дома". {n}Последние слова Теобальд произносит чуть мягче — с благоговением глядя на спящую девушку.{/n}

languages.text: "So choose whose side you are on — a murderous traitor, or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the unconscious young woman with reverence.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Так что решайте, на чьей вы стороне — предателя и убийцы или законной наследницы Дома". {n}Последние слова Теобальд произносит чуть мягче, с благоговением глядя на спящую девушку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So choose whose side you are on, a murderous traitor or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the sleeping young woman with reverence.{/n}
"So choose whose side you are on, a murderous traitor or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the sleeping young woman with reverence.{/n}
"So choose whose side you are on — a murderous traitor, or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the unconscious young woman with reverence.{/n}
"So choose whose side you are on — a murderous traitor, or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the unconscious young woman with reverence.{/n}
"So choose whose side you are on — a murderous traitor, or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the unconscious young woman with reverence.{/n}

languages.text: “好了，该选择站在哪一边了。是谋害他人的叛徒，还是尊贵家族的合法子嗣？”{n}西奥巴德轻声说着这些话，以敬畏的目光看着不省人事的年轻女子。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So choose whose side you are on — a murderous traitor, or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the unconscious young woman with reverence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “好了，该选择站在哪一边了。是谋害他人的叛徒，还是尊贵家族的合法子嗣？”{n}西奥巴德轻声说着这些话，以敬畏的目光看着不省人事的年轻女子。{/n}

languages.text: «Elija bien en qué bando está: el de un asesino traidor o el de la legítima heredera de una casa noble». {n}Theobald pronuncia estas palabras en voz baja, con una mirada de veneración fija en la joven inconsciente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So choose whose side you are on — a murderous traitor, or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the unconscious young woman with reverence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Elija bien en qué bando está: el de un asesino traidor o el de la legítima heredera de una casa noble». {n}Theobald pronuncia estas palabras en voz baja, con una mirada de veneración fija en la joven inconsciente.{/n}

languages.text: 「では、あなたはどちらに味方するか選ぶが良い。人殺しの裏切り者か、それとも高貴な家の合法的な末裔か」{n}テオバルトは、意識を失った若い女性を敬虔なまなざしで見つめながら、穏やかに言葉を口にした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So choose whose side you are on — a murderous traitor, or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the unconscious young woman with reverence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「では、あなたはどちらに味方するか選ぶが良い。人殺しの裏切り者か、それとも高貴な家の合法的な末裔か」{n}テオバルトは、意識を失った若い女性を敬虔なまなざしで見つめながら、穏やかに言葉を口にした。{/n}

languages.text: "Wählt also, auf wessen Seite Ihr steht — auf der eines mörderischen Verräters oder auf der einer rechtmäßigen Erbin eines Adelshauses." {n}Theobald spricht diese Worte sanft und blickt die bewusstlose Frau dabei mit großer Ehrerbietung an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So choose whose side you are on — a murderous traitor, or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the unconscious young woman with reverence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wählt also, auf wessen Seite Ihr steht — auf der eines mörderischen Verräters oder auf der einer rechtmäßigen Erbin eines Adelshauses." {n}Theobald spricht diese Worte sanft und blickt die bewusstlose Frau dabei mit großer Ehrerbietung an.{/n}

languages.text: « Choisissez donc votre camp : celui d'un traître meurtrier, ou celui de l'héritière légitime d'une noble maison. » {n}Théobald termine sa phrase sur un ton empreint de tendresse, en regardant la jeune femme inconsciente avec un profond respect.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So choose whose side you are on — a murderous traitor, or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the unconscious young woman with reverence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Choisissez donc votre camp : celui d'un traître meurtrier, ou celui de l'héritière légitime d'une noble maison. » {n}Théobald termine sa phrase sur un ton empreint de tendresse, en regardant la jeune femme inconsciente avec un profond respect.{/n}

languages.text: "Kimin tarafında olduğunu seç. Eli kanlı bir hainin mi yoksa soylu bir Hane'nin meşru evladının mı?" {n}Theobald, bu son sözcüklerini şuursuz hâldeki genç kadına hürmetle bakarak, yumuşak bir sesle sarf ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So choose whose side you are on — a murderous traitor, or the lawful scion of a noble House." {n}Theobald speaks these words softly, looking at the unconscious young woman with reverence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kimin tarafında olduğunu seç. Eli kanlı bir hainin mi, yoksa soylu bir Hane'nin meşru evladının mı?" {n}Theobald, bu son sözcüklerini şuursuz hâldeki genç kadına hürmetle bakarak, yumuşak bir sesle sarf ediyor.{/n}
